attributes.action: Call for a of 'Vote of NO Confidence in 'Labour,Conservatives and the Liberal democrats'
attributes.additional_details: All 3 main party's are unsuitable/unable to run this country as morally as it should be run.all 'party's are responsible for 'massive debt,continuing suffering and death of its 'own'people,while providing 'massive financial'help to other countries.Continuing and increasing abuses of the 'uk' peoples 'human rights' by OUR own government.We as a nation of people,are NOT supported by our own government,nor the other party's.This is call for dismissing of parliament,control returned to the Queen and a new civilian based government to be formed,with the peoples interests 1st,NOT last
